detail_desc: 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems. The jeans are made partly from organic cotton.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems. The jeans are made partly from organic cotton.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, long, slightly wider cuffed sleeves and a flared skirt. Lined at the front of the bodice.

Calf-length, sleeveless dress with a lace top and pleated skirt in an airy weave. Round neck, narrow elasticated seam at the waist with a lace flounce, and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Lined.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.

Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. The skirt is in a softly draping, asymmetric cut with a laser-cut hem. Unlined.
